autograd.torch.optim package

Submodules

autograd.torch.optim.lr_scheduler module

class autograd.torch.optim.lr_scheduler.LRScheduler(optimizer, last_epoch=-1)

Bases: object

get_lr()

Calculate the learning rate. This method should be implemented by subclasses.

step()

Update the learning rate based on the current epoch.

class autograd.torch.optim.lr_scheduler.LinearLR(optimizer, start_factor=1.0, end_factor=1.0, total_iters=1, last_epoch=-1)

Bases: LRScheduler

get_lr()

Calculate the learning rate based on the current epoch.

Returns:

The updated learning rate.

autograd.torch.optim.optimizer module

class autograd.torch.optim.optimizer.Optimizer(parameters, lr)

Bases: object

step()

Perform a single optimization step. This method should be implemented by subclasses.

zero_grad()

Set gradients of all parameters to zero.

class autograd.torch.optim.optimizer.SGD(parameters, lr, weight_decay=0)

Bases: Optimizer

step()

Perform a single optimization step using SGD.
